team_cards.n5: August 25th - '''[[Washington Justice]]''' promote {{player|PRE|flag=us|pos=manager}} to ''Senior Advisor''. <ref name="WASH5">{{cite web|url=https://twitter.com/washjustice/status/1562847479225524224|title=We’re pleased to announce that GM @PRE_owl has transitioned into a senior advisory role with the team.|publisher='''[[Washington Justice]]'''|date=2022-08-25}}</ref>
